mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product (product_code, product_category, product_title, product_price, product_shelf_life, product_sub_title, product_content, product_weight, product_sales_unit, product_origin) values (seq_product_code.nextval, #{product_category}, #{product_title}, #{product_price}, #{product_shelf_life}, #{product_sub_title}, #{product_content}, #{product_weight}, #{product_sales_unit}, #{product_origin})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum, a.*from (select * from tbl_product order by product_registration_date desc)a )b where rownum between 1 and 1
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product_image (image_code, product_code, image_info_file_name, image_content_file_name) values (seq_image_code.nextval, #{product_code}, #{image_info_file_name}, #{image_content_file_name})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_product order by product_code desc
select * from tbl_product_image order by image_code desc

select * from (select rownum, a.* from (select * from tbl_product where ( sysdate < product_sales_deadlines or product_sales_deadlines is null ) order by product_order_count desc)a )b where rownum between 1 and #{best_count} order by rownum asc
select * from tbl_product where ( sysdate < product_sales_deadlines or product_sales_deadlines is null ) and product_category = #{product_category} order by product_code desc
select * from tbl_product where sysdate - #{conditionDate} < product_registration_date order by product_registration_date desc
select * from tbl_product where ( sysdate < product_sales_deadlines or product_sales_deadlines is null ) and product_order_count > #{conditionOrderCount} order by product_order_count desc
select * from tbl_product where ( sysdate < product_sales_deadlines and product_sales_deadlines is not null ) and sysdate + 14 >= product_sales_deadlines order by product_sales_deadlines asc

select * from (select * from tbl_product where ( sysdate < product_sales_deadlines or product_sales_deadlines is null ) and ( product_category = #{product_category} and product_code != #{product_code} ) order by dbms_random.value) where rownum <= 6
